Title: reinterpret
Description: Uses the same source in-memory bytes sequence for x value and reinterprets it to destination type.
x — Any type.type — Destination type. String.
Examples: SELECT reinterpret(toInt8(-1), 'UInt8') as int_to_uint,    reinterpret(toInt8(1), 'Float32') as int_to_float,    reinterpret('1', 'UInt32') as string_to_int;
EffectiveSQLsRefined: SELECT reinterpret(toInt8(-1), 'UInt8') as int_to_uint,    reinterpret(toInt8(1), 'Float32') as int_to_float,    reinterpret('1', 'UInt32') as string_to_int;
